Q.11 – Q.35 Carry ONE mark Each 
Question 11                              
[Computer Organization & Architecture (Input Output Organization)]
Consider a computer with a 4 MHz processor. Its DMA controller can transfer 8 bytes in 1 cycle from a 
device to main memory through cycle stealing at regular intervals. Which one of the following is the data 
transfer rate (in bits per second) of the DMA controller if 1% of the processor cycles are used for DMA?
(A) 25,60,000 
(B) 32,00
(C) 25,60,000 
(D) 32,000
answer_text:
(C) 
Sol.
 
To transfer 8 bytes, it requires 1 cycle time.
